verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>. The fool <S%H5036><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, There is no 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>. They are corrupt <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, they have done abominable <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8689><s%> works <S%H5949><s%>, there is none that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> looked down <S%H8259><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> if there <S%H3426><s%> were any that did understand <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, and seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

They are all gone aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, they are all together <S%H3162><s%> become filthy <S%H444><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: there is none that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>, no, not one <S%H259><s%>.

Have all the workers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? who eat up <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> as they eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not upon the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
There were they in great <S%H6343><s%> fear <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is in the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
Ye have shamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%>, because the YY <S%H3068><s%> is his refuge <S%H4268><s%>.

Oh that <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were come out of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> ! when the YY <S%H3068><s%> bringeth back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
